prod_desc: Hang out with Lightning McQueen, Mack and Cruz Ramirez!
prod_long_desc:
Disney•Pixar Cars 3 fans will love creating friendship stories with these iconic characters in Radiator Springs. Help your young Cars fan develop fine motor skills building Lightning McQueen, Cruz Ramirez and Mack, and when they’ve all finished hanging out at Flo’s V8 Café, your child can fuel them all up at the gas pump. They’ll have endless fun driving Lightning McQueen up the ramp into Mack’s trailer and heading off to his next race.
Build your own Disney Pixar Flo’s V8 Café, complete with façade, gas pump, bricks decorated as gas pump dials, Flo’s sign, and buildable Disney Cars 3 characters.
Includes buildable Disney Pixar Lightning McQueen, Cruz Ramirez and Mack
LEGO DUPLO Cars toys are compatible with other DUPLO construction sets for creative building
Flo’s V8 Café measures 5” high, 4” wide and 2” long. Lightning McQueen Cruz Ramirez measure over 1” high, 3” long and 2” wide. Mack measures over 4” high, 10” long and 2” wide.
28 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 2 and 5
